txt.en: Sorcerer's Chamber
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Seregruin has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
The Sorceror's Chamber has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#FF0000>Puiguil has been defeated!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: As the last craban falls, the pack leader Swartclaw swoops in!</rgb>
'With the sorcerer defeated, we can sleep peacefully at night, knowing we are now safe. Thank you for coming to our aid.'
'The ford remains ours and Rivendell shall be free from any assault, at least for this day. This was a good victory, one the enemy's forces will not soon recover from.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The West Bridge is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A flock of crebain screech from a roosting tree up the ramp to the north</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The egg sac explodes in a puddle of goop</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Ghostfang has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Laeglang has been defeated!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Rimdeloth has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Screaming and scratching echo from the main courtyard</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Spider-eggs cocoon the room ahead</rgb>
'My sword stands ready.'
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Lower Courtyard!</rgb>
Claim the lower courtyard
Claim the south entranceway
Claim the west bridge
'Now, prepare to meet your end for daring to meddle in the plans of Dol Guldur!'
Claim the east terrace
Open the upper courtyard
Defeat the sorcerer and claim the sorcerer's chamber
Elrohir must survive
'I do not know who you are, but I presume you are here to rescue these poor lost souls.'
'But I am not yet done with them, and I do not take kindly to interruptions!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Lower Courtyard is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: As the torches sputter to life, Ruingalad comes streaking around the corner!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Crashing and thunderous feet behind you tell that more than just the Elves heard that horn</rgb>
Upper Courtyard
<rgb=#00FF00>The lower courtyard is yours. The Enemy will not willingly leave it that way</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The upper courtyard is in your control and the gates to the sorcerer's chamber have opened</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The sorcerer and the threat from Dannenglor have been defeated. Audaghaim and the Golden Host are safe</rgb>
A son of Elrond has fallen.
A son of Elrond has fallen.
'At last help has arrived!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Ruingalad has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
Eastern Terrace
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The torch flames flicker out as you take the West Bridge</rgb>
The South Entranceway has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
South Entranceway
The doors to the Upper Courtyard of Dannenglor creak open.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A terrible Morvul scream echoes through the courtyard as the second torch alights</rgb>
The Upper Courtyard has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The East Terrace is now under your control.</rgb>
The Lower Courtyard has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Fiklúk has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Chanting echoes from the structure to the North</rgb>
Strike Against Dannenglor
The West Bridge has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#FF0000>Prestadír has been defeated!</rgb>
'We do not have much time! You must hurry!'
The counterattack has been defeated. It is safe to press on
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the South Entranceway!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Helchfaer has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'This bridge is crucial to their defences... you must claim it!'
'I do not have much strength left, but I will help you all I can.'
'Let them come!'
'I must retreat to tend my wounds. Please, save the others.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Sounds of teeth gnashing and bones being gnawed come from ahead</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A sharp gust of wind extinguishes the torches at the South Entranceway</rgb>
Several Elves and Rangers have been taken prisoner by a sorcerer within the ancient Elf-ruins of Dannenglor.
'Thank goodness you have come! The situation is most dire!'
'They have been held captive here for nearly a week, I am sure they are near breaking!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gorogmúl has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'Please, rescue them while there is still time!'
'Please... please help me....'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: An Elf scouting-horn sounds from across the river, you should find a horn and respond</rgb>
'We shall fend them off together.'
The East Terrace has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
'Quickly, dispatch them all and claim this gate!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The South Entranceway is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
West Bridge
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the West Bridge!</rgb>
'I am sure our paths will cross again.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gothling has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Idhrenfair has been defeated!</rgb>
Lower Courtyard
'My wounds are not so serious that I cannot fight.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The South Entranceway is now under your control</rgb>
'I am ready to face the evil!'
'Thank you for your aid and rescue. We can leave free and in peace now.'
'I must take my leave, I wish you the best.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: As the courtyard falls to your control, an ancient guardian of it returns</rgb>
The enemy has launched a counterattack!
'Looks like you get a reprieve, Athrandir. Your would be rescuers will pay dearly for having interrupted me!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Swartclaw has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Furious at the eggs being destroyed, Gothling descends from the dead limbs above</rgb>
The doors of Dannenglor have been sealed. To infiltrate the ancient ruins, you will have to enter through the lower courtyard and work your way up.
The heart of Dannenglor is a large open courtyard with a southern gate, western bridge, and eastern terrace. All three of those will need to be in your control to advance.
The small upper courtyard is the only thing keeping you from the sorcerer.
To take Dannenglor for the Golden Host and free its prisoners, the sorcerer residing here must be defeated and his chamber claimed.
<rgb=#00FF00>The West Bridge is now under your control</rgb>
